content: run.py from fastapi import FastAPI app = FastAPI() @app.get("/") async def root(): return {"message": "Hello World"} Procfile web: gunicorn -w 4 -k uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker run:app requirements.txt fastapi gunicorn uvicorn
title: Deploy Fastapi to Heroku
